description: At the Tour Championship in Atlanta, the PGA Tour has rolled out a more muscular rebuttal to LIV Golf. The exodus may continue anyway.
dc:creator: Alan Blinder
media:description: Cameron Smith, left, and Rory McIlroy, who are paired for the opening rounds of the Tour Championship.
